name: Snowscape (Dirk, Jesse Roffel, Marvin Damstra, Tdead1, Arie.Bennik)
name_original: Snowscape (Dirk, Jesse Roffel, Marvin Damstra, Tdead1, Arie.Bennik)
description:
A charming adventure puzzler about about a little robot who lost its way. You awaken in a frozen landscape, with your last bit of battery power you roll towards a power station, and restore part of your strength. Reinvigorated, you set out on your journey back home. Explore the frozen landscape to discover parts to upgrade yourself, and use your newfound abilities to traverse the landscape and restore power to a terraforming pylon in order to melt the wall of ice that blocks your path home. 

Made in the Global Game Jam 2019

Controls: 

Use a controller for the best experience. 

Controller
  • Left stick to move around. 

When you've unlocked the upgrades: 

  • Right trigger for the laser (unlocked after button on the left side of the map). 
  • Both bumpers to use the magnet (unlocked after button on the right side of the map). 
Keyboard
  • WASD keys to move. 

When you've unlocked the upgrades: 

  • Spacebar for the laser (unlocked after button on the left side of the map). 
  • T and Y for the magnet (unlocked after button on the right side of the map).
